description:
One of the most exciting Teachers' Day celebration ideas is to offer gifts to your teachers.关于庆祝教师节最令人兴奋的一件事就是给你的老师送礼物了。

If you have left school years ago, and you'd like to send a gift to your teachers, use an old photo of your teachers with you and your classmates. Get it laminated with a beautiful frame It'll make your teachers feel nostalgic, and they'll be delighted to recollect those lovely memories.如果你在几年前就已经离开校园，而且你想给老师送一份礼物，你可以送一张老师和全班同学合影的老照片，把照片装在漂亮的相框里。这会让你的老师感到很怀念，他们会很愉快地追忆那些美好的过去。

An interesting idea for a Teachers' Day gifts is to offer a stylish notebook that comes with a silk laminate cover. You can actually personalize such a notebook by adding your own photos for the cover.有一个关于教师节礼物的有趣想法，那就是送一本时髦的笔记本，笔记本的封面是有一层薄丝压盖住。你可以把自己的照片夹在封面上，让这本笔记本完全具有你的个人特点。

One of the best Teachers' Day gifts is a tote bag which your teachers can use to carry their papers, test copies, books, and more. You may look for an online tote bag and personalize it with a nice photo that'll make your gift an exciting one indeed!最棒的教师节礼物之一就是手提包，你的老师可以用来装文件、考卷、书以及其他东西。你可以在网上找一个手提包，然后个性化地在上面印上好看的照片，我保证，这样的礼物真的会让人激动！

The most popular gift for Teachers' Day is a bouquet of lovely flowers which reflect your blooming wishes for your teachers.教师节最流行的礼物就是一束好看的花朵了，这能体现你对老师满满的祝福。

You may gift a bouquet of yellow gerberas and white roses to make your teachers feel loved and treasured.你可以送一束黄色的非洲菊和白玫瑰，让你的老师感受到你对他的热爱和重视。

You may choose a basket of purple and white orchids with green fillers to make it a perfect combination.你也可以选择一篮插在绿色填充物上的紫色和白色的兰花，这可是绝妙的组合。

A bouquet of pink lilies is just ideal to convey your lovely wishes on Teachers' Day.一束粉色的百合花也可以很好地表达你对教师节的美好祝愿。
